attributes.action: Reduce The Tax Duty On Fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are petitioning for the tax duty on fuel to be significantly reduced. It is no use blanketing the public by saying we are in discussion with the fuel producing countries to reduce the price of fuel when 60 percent of the price of fuel is Tax Duty.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/cut-fuel-costs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
